full_summary:
# Public Notice: Invitation to Tender

## Request for Standing Offer: Full Spectrum LED Lights

**Reference Number:**
WS4372130381

**Publication Date:**
2024-01-12

**Tender Closing Date:**
2024-02-02 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit a proposal for a standing offer contract for the provision of full spectrum LED lights.

**Description of Requirement:**
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking full spectrum LED lights for replacement of bulbs in their greenhouses. The successful supplier will be responsible for supplying the necessary equipment to meet AAFC's requirements.

**Terms and Conditions:**
* This is a standing offer contract;
* The Procurement Method is Competitive - Open Bidding;
* The Selection Criteria is Lowest Price;
* The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price submitted by the bidders;
* Compliant bidders will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the technical and commercial requirements of the solicitation document.

**Contract Award Criteria:**
The contract will be awarded to the bidder that submits the lowest price that meets the technical and commercial requirements of the solicitation document.

**Notice of Modification:**
Please disregard the Amendment to Closing Time posted in Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys, and submit all required documents and bids by 14:00 EST on February 2, 2024.

**Important Contact Information:**

* Purchaser: Melanie Perrin, PSPC
* Email: [melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Note: Contact Information for telephone, fax, and postal address are not available.

You can find the full solicitation document and submission information at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18500963?extsite=MTg1MDA5NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Responses to this solicitation must be received by the above-mentioned deadline to be considered.

Please ensure that all documents are submitted in the English language. 

A Note to readers:
Although some detailed information were removed, you should be able to find and extract all relevant details you may need in this rewritten notice.
